author: selfuryon
content: Hey! We (P2P.org) shutdown our Holesky infra (we announced that in the TG Chat last week, so duplicate that here too) today

author: barnabasbusa
content: Final reminder that Holesky is going off this week. Please migrate all your activities away from Holesky as soon as possible, if you haven't done it already
